argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | sb5rf.1 | |- ( ph -> A. y ph ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_sbid2h | |- ( [ x / y ] [ y / x ] ph <-> ph ) |
| 3 |  | #P_sb1 | |- ( [ x / y ] [ y / x ] ph -> E. y ( y = x /\ [ y / x ] ph ) ) |
| 4 | 2, 3 | #P_sylbir | |- ( ph -> E. y ( y = x /\ [ y / x ] ph ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_stdpc7 | |- ( y = x -> ( [ y / x ] ph -> ph ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_imp | |- ( ( y = x /\ [ y / x ] ph ) -> ph ) |
| 7 | 1, 6 | #P_exlimih | |- ( E. y ( y = x /\ [ y / x ] ph ) -> ph ) |
| 8 | 4, 7 | #P_impbii | |- ( ph <-> E. y ( y = x /\ [ y / x ] ph ) ) |
\
 Reversed substitution.  (Contributed by NM, 3-Feb-2005.)  (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 25-May-2011.)
